text: @realDonaldTrump maybe they should all be shipped to wuhan to breath some the air there. no? a little harsh huh? well hell, just give em all a vaccine ahead of time then... and if Ncov19 doesnt get em... the vaccine side effects sure as heck will. i say all members of congress vaccinate 1st.
